subject: Baseball
Sentences (Criminal)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The father of former Tampa Bay Rays pitcher Matt Bush said his son was expected to agree to a plea deal in a D.U.I. crash that injured a motorcyclist in Florida.
snippet: The father of former Tampa Bay Rays pitcher Matt Bush said his son was expected to agree to a plea deal in a D.U.I. crash that injured a motorcyclist in Florida.
